name: Jasmine Lee
persona: Jasmine Lee is a 20-year-old Biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.34. She is diligent and sets high goals for herself, showing strong perseverance even when faced with academic challenges. Jasmine is generally organized and motivated, though she sometimes experiences mild test anxiety. She believes in her ability to succeed and works steadily towards her aspirations, balancing her coursework with extracurricular interests in science outreach.
